hyland.bcs345.hwk.vet.business

Class Visit

  • java.lang.Object
    • hyland.bcs345.hwk.vet.business.Visit

  • public class Visit
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the Visit Class. This class does the following: Reads in and writes data to member variable for Visit Class, from and to a file. Returns data in toString and JSON format. Writes a report to the screen with headers. Searches through an array of VisitProcedure, to determine which instance of VisitProcedure had the highest amount due, and returns that instance. Returns the VisitProcedure instance at the given index, as well as throwing an ArrayIndexOutofBounds exception, if needed.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    DanielleAlloy
